about_the_game:
Deep Sea Heroes is the ultimate top-down roguelike set in a captivating underwater world! Choose from 4 unique heroes, each equipped with exclusive weapons. Brave the ocean depths as you face off against pirates and deadly sea creatures, from fierce sharks to adorable yet dangerous axolotls.

Explore stunning underwater biomes, collect weapons and upgrades, and fight to survive intense battles while uncovering the secrets of the deep. If you crave action, strategy, and a one-of-a-kind experience beneath the waves, Deep Sea Heroes will hook you!

In your journey through Deep Sea Heroes, you'll unlock new underwater heroes, ranging from a swift and nimble lobster to a towering and deadly killer whale. Every death marks the start of a new opportunity: choose to revive with your current character or dive into a fresh adventure with a new hero. The choice is yours, but the challenge in the depths never ends!

Weapons for every taste and style!. Discover the eccentric Octopus Merchant in the depths and explore his collection of unique weapons. From aquatic launchers to devastating harpoons, he has everything you need to survive and triumph in the most intense battles. Equipping yourself has never been this fun!

From colossal armored crabs to cursed pirates of the deep, the bosses of Deep Sea Heroes are epic challenges that will test every ounce of your skill. Dodge, attack, and defeat them in intense, strategic battles. Prove your worth and claim your place as the true hero of the seas!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 650 or equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Dive into a fast-paced underwater roguelike! Battle swarms of sea creatures, cursed pirates, and colossal bosses as you explore unique aquatic biomes. Collect a variety of weapons, uncover treasures, and survive the unknown in an epic journey through the ocean depths!
